Posts.Content: Lynn45 wrote: I have had nipple crusting for about 6 months I was able to pick it off a few weeks ago it was soft and a light brown colour and the left breast has been tender for a long time...I am really worried this is breast cancer...has anyone else had this symptom a light to medium brown soft crustiness on nipple?
